1. Why you shouldn’t worry about AI eating the stock market, top analyst says. The U.S. economy is ‘about to take off’  Fortune
  2. Who Is On the Other Side of the AI Software Trade?  Bloomberg
  3. How exposed are software stocks to AI tools? We put vibe-coding to the test  CNBC
  4. Software Ate the World. Now AI Is Eating Software.  Business Insider
  5. AI wiped out $400 billion this week — and it's only getting started  Axios
